title: I got an A?
body: I just had a Bard support game where I went 11-1-22, had a vision score of 97, and got an A?  I love bard and have been trying desperately to get my last S on him for lvl 7 mastery.... why in the world did I get an A this game?

replies.body: A is still a great score!  Based on your role and game mode, other bards seems to have performed just a bit better.  Was your game a rather long one?  I don't really have tips to offer beyond what you already know or in our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Just keep at it and you'll get there!

41 minutes.... and what qualifies as better than 11-1-22?  I'm a little confused and frustrated since I placed 48 wards, bought a control ward, and have had far worse games where I got a better score.  What am I missing?  I had the highest kill partipation on my team, highest vision score, and this is far better than games where I have gotten an S- or S prior.
